Title: New flowers of Suzhou embroidery are always in spring
Publisher: Jiangsu renmin chubanshe (江苏人民出版社)
Notes: Visitors in an embroidery workshop admire a table screen with a picture of the Nanjing Yangzi River Bridge. "Suzhou embroidery" is a famous and traditional style, typically using silk.This poster was hand-signed by the artist.
Theme: Working WomenThe Yangzi River Bridge in Nanjing
